title: Folk culture event held in Zhejiang to welcome lunar new year
content: Villagers make traditional fish balls in Quanyi Village of Donglin Town in Huzhou, east China's Zhejiang Province, Jan. 30, 2021. A folk culture event was held in Quanyi Village Saturday to welcome the Chinese Lunar New Year. Villagers make traditional food with fresh fish and serve them to the elderly and staff from other cities in local nursing home. (Xinhua/Xu Yu)
